lead_paragraph: TULLMAN--Irene B.,of Boca Raton, FL and Hewlett, NY passed away peacefully on April 13, 2016 at age 96. Cherished daughter of the late Bessie Bluver and Harry Bluver; loving wife of the late Harold Tullman for 53 years; beloved mother of Jeffrey Tullman and Elayne Tullman Lustig (deceased); and mother-in-law of Dr. Hollace Jackson Tullman and Peter Lustig; adoring grandmother of Matthew Tullman, Gillian Tullman Whalen and Adam Lustig; and proud great-grandmother of Brighton, Sage, Tyler, Hannah and Jackson. The family will hold a private memorial service. Contributions may be made in Irene's memory to the American Heart Association. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TULLMAN, IRENE B.
